verses.verse: <WG2532> After<WG3326> these things<WG5023> Jesus<WG2424> walked<WG4043> in<WG1722> Galilee:<WG1056> for<WG1063> he would<WG2309> not<WG3756> walk<WG4043> in<WG1722> Jewry,<WG2449> because<WG3754> the<WG3588> Jews<WG2453> sought<WG2212> to kill<WG615> him.<WG846>
Now <WG1161> the<WG3588> Jews'<WG2453> feast<WG1859> of tabernacles<WG4634> was<WG2258> at hand.<WG1451>

His <WG846> brethren<WG80> therefore<WG3767> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him,<WG846> Depart<WG3327> hence,<WG1782> and<WG2532> go<WG5217> into<WG1519> Judea,<WG2449> that<WG2443> thy<WG4675> disciples<WG3101> also<WG2532> may see<WG2334> the<WG3588> works<WG2041> that<WG3739> thou doest.<WG4160>

For <WG1063> there is no man<WG3762> that doeth<WG4160> any thing<WG5100> in<WG1722> secret,<WG2927> and<WG2532> he<WG846> himself seeketh<WG2212> to be<WG1511> known openly.<WG1722> <WG3954> If<WG1487> thou do<WG4160> these things,<WG5023> show<WG5319> thyself<WG4572> to the<WG3588> world.<WG2889>

Then <WG3767> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> My <WG1699> time<WG2540> is not yet<WG3768> come: <WG3918> but<WG1161> your<WG5212> time<WG2540> is<WG2076> always<WG3842> ready. <WG2092>

The <WG3588> world<WG2889> cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> hate <WG3404> you;<WG5209> but<WG1161> me<WG1691> it hateth,<WG3404> because<WG3754> I<WG1473> testify<WG3140> of<WG4012> it,<WG846> that<WG3754> the<WG3588> works<WG2041> thereof<WG846> are<WG2076> evil. <WG4190>

Go ye up <WG305> <WG5210> unto <WG1519> this<WG5026> feast: <WG1859> I<WG1473> go not up yet <WG305> <WG3768> unto <WG1519> this<WG5026> feast;<WG1859> for<WG3754> my<WG1699> time<WG2540> is not yet<WG3768> full come. <WG4137>
When <WG1161> he had said<WG2036> these words<WG5023> unto them,<WG846> he abode<WG3306> still in<WG1722> Galilee.<WG1056>

But <WG1161> when<WG5613> his<WG846> brethren<WG80> were gone up,<WG305> then<WG5119> went he also up<WG305> <WG846> <WG2532> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> feast,<WG1859> not<WG3756> openly,<WG5320> but<WG235> as it were<WG5613> in<WG1722> secret.<WG2927>

Howbeit <WG3305> no man<WG3762> spake<WG2980> openly<WG3954> of<WG4012> him<WG846> for<WG1223> fear<WG5401> of the<WG3588> Jews.<WG2453>

If <WG1437> any man<WG5100> will<WG2309> do<WG4160> his<WG846> will,<WG2307> he shall know<WG1097> of<WG4012> the<WG3588> doctrine,<WG1322> whether<WG4220> it be<WG2076> of<WG1537> God,<WG2316> or<WG2228> whether I<WG1473> speak<WG2980> of<WG575> myself. <WG1683>

He that speaketh<WG2980> of<WG575> himself<WG1438> seeketh<WG2212> his own<WG2398> glory: <WG1391> but<WG1161> he that seeketh<WG2212> his glory<WG1391> that sent<WG3992> him,<WG846> the same<WG3778> is<WG2076> true,<WG227> and<WG2532> no<WG3756> unrighteousness<WG93> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> him. <WG846>

Did not<WG3756> Moses<WG3475> give<WG1325> you<WG5213> the<WG3588> law,<WG3551> and<WG2532> yet none<WG3762> of<WG1537> you<WG5216> keepeth<WG4160> the<WG3588> law?<WG3551> Why<WG5101> go ye about<WG2212> to kill<WG615> me? <WG3165>
The <WG3588> people<WG3793> answered<WG611> and<WG2532> said,<WG2036> Thou hast<WG2192> a devil:<WG1140> who<WG5101> goeth about<WG2212> to kill<WG615> thee?<WG4571>

Moses <WG3475> therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> gave <WG1325> unto you<WG5213> circumcision;<WG4061> (not<WG3756> because<WG3754> it is<WG2076> of<WG1537> Moses,<WG3475> but<WG235> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> fathers;)<WG3962> and<WG2532> ye on<WG1722> the sabbath day<WG4521> circumcise<WG4059> a man. <WG444>

Judge <WG2919> not<WG3361> according<WG2596> to the appearance,<WG3799> but<WG235> judge<WG2919> righteous<WG1342> judgment. <WG2920>
Then <WG3767> said<WG3004> some<WG5100> of<WG1537> them of Jerusalem,<WG2415> Is<WG2076> not<WG3756> this<WG3778> he, whom<WG3739> they seek<WG2212> to kill?<WG615>

But <WG1161> I<WG1473> know<WG1492> him: <WG846> for<WG3754> I am<WG1510> from<WG3844> him,<WG846> and he<WG2548> hath sent<WG649> me. <WG3165>

Ye shall seek<WG2212> me,<WG3165> and<WG2532> shall not<WG3756> find<WG2147> me: and<WG2532> where<WG3699> I<WG1473> am,<WG1510> thither ye<WG5210> cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> come. <WG2064>

What <WG5101> manner of saying<WG3056> is<WG2076> this<WG3778> that<WG3739> he said,<WG2036> Ye shall seek<WG2212> me,<WG3165> and<WG2532> shall not<WG3756> find<WG2147> me: and<WG2532> where <WG3699> I<WG1473> am,<WG1510> thither ye<WG5210> cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> come?<WG2064>

In <WG1722> the<WG3588> last<WG2078> day,<WG2250> that great<WG3173> day of the<WG3588> feast,<WG1859> Jesus<WG2424> stood<WG2476> and<WG2532> cried,<WG2896> saying,<WG3004> If <WG1437> any man<WG5100> thirst,<WG1372> let him come<WG2064> unto<WG4314> me,<WG3165> and<WG2532> drink. <WG4095>

Many <WG4183> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> people<WG3793> therefore,<WG3767> when they heard<WG191> this saying,<WG3056> said,<WG3004> Of a truth<WG230> this<WG3778> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> Prophet.<WG4396>

Others <WG243> said,<WG3004> This<WG3778> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> Christ.<WG5547> But<WG1161> some<WG243> said,<WG3004> Shall<WG1063> <WG3361> Christ<WG5547> come<WG2064> out of<WG1537> Galilee?<WG1056>

Then <WG3767> answered<WG611> them<WG846> the<WG3588> Pharisees,<WG5330> Are<WG3361> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> deceived?<WG4105>

But <WG235> this<WG3778> people<WG3793> who knoweth<WG1097> not<WG3361> the<WG3588> law<WG3551> are<WG1526> cursed.<WG1944>
Nicodemus <WG3530> saith<WG3004> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> (he that came<WG2064> to<WG4314> Jesus<WG846> by night,<WG3571> being<WG5607> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> them,)<WG846>
